mapper.insert: insert into faq ( faq_no, member_id, faq_title, faq_head, faq_content, wdate ) values ( faq_no_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{faq_title}, #{faq_head}, #{faq_content}, sysdate )
mapper.select:
select faq_no,faq_title,faq_head,faq_content,wdate,member_id as writer from FAQ faq , member m
order by faq_no desc, wdate desc
select count(*) from FAQ faq, member m

choose.when: where faq.member_id = m. like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or faq_content like '%' || #{keyword}||'%' or faq_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or faq_head like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
